correlations = data.corr()

ax = sns.heatmap(
    correlations, 
    vmin=-1, vmax=1, center=0,
    square=True
)
ax.set_xticklabels(
    ax.get_xticklabels(),
    rotation=45,
    horizontalalignment='right'
)
